build.description:
Changes which affect the build system or external dependencies.
Example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm

footerTypes.name: BREAKING CHANGE
footerTypes.description: The commit introduces breaking API changes

footerTypes.name: Closes
footerTypes.description: The commit closes issues or pull requests

footerTypes.name: Co-authored-by
footerTypes.description:
The commit is co-authored by another person.
For multiple people use one line each

footerTypes.name: Refs
footerTypes.description:
The commit references other commits by their hash ID.
For multiple hash IDs use a comma as separator
